titles.title: Blue Ridge National Heritage Area Reauthorization Act of 2017
Blue Ridge National Heritage Area Reauthorization Act of 2017
A bill to reauthorize the Blue Ridge National Heritage Area.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Energy and Natural Resources.
Committee on Energy and Natural Resources Subcommittee on National Parks. Hearings held. With printed Hearing: S.Hrg. 115-504.

term.name: Wilderness and natural areas, wildlife refuges, wild rivers, habitats

bill.summary:
Blue Ridge National Heritage Area Reauthorization Act of 2017
This bill extends the authority of the Department of the Interior to furnish assistance for the Blue Ridge National Heritage Area in North Carolina for four more years.
